feed.title: Millenium Blades Wiki - Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses)

entry.title: Archdruid Ascendant Elco (Master Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses))
entry.summary: Reaction: Prevent one of your cards from being flipped by an effect an opponent controls. | Action: Each opponent with 7 or more cards in hand must discard a card at random.
entry.content:
Archdruid Ascendant Elco

Source Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses)
Set Return of the Druid Kings
Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 4⭐
Element Water
Type Mage
Reaction: Prevent one of your cards from being flipped by an effect an opponent controls. | Action: Each opponent with 7 or more cards in hand must discard a card at random.
Source Symbol -
References
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2016

entry.title: Car'dganoth the Devourer (Master Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses))
entry.summary: Play: For each Single or Accessory in your tableau with a +1 STAR Token on it, add a +1 STAR Token to this card. | Action: Remove any number of +1 STAR Tokens from cards in your tableau. Gain 5 RP per Token removed. (max. 40 RP).
entry.content:
Car'dganoth the Devourer

Source Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses)
Set EEG (Eldritch Entertainment Group)
Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 8⭐
Element Dark
Type Myth
Play: For each Single or Accessory in your tableau with a +1 STAR Token on it, add a +1 STAR Token to this card. | Action: Remove any number of +1 STAR Tokens from cards in your tableau. Gain 5 RP per Token removed. (max. 40 RP).
Source Symbol -
References
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2016
Count 2

entry.title: Constellation Man (Master Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses))
entry.summary: Each opponent picks up the left-most card in his tableau and passes it to the player on his left (passing over you). Those players insert those cards in the left-most spaces of their tableaus (effects don't active).
entry.content:
Constellation Man

Source Mini Expansion #4 (Final Bosses)
Set They Game from Space
Cost $6
Card Type Master
Quantity
Star Rating 8⭐
Element Air
Type Myth
Each opponent picks up the left-most card in his tableau and passes it to the player on his left (passing over you). Those players insert those cards in the left-most spaces of their tableaus (effects don't active).
Source Symbol -
References
Comments & Errata
Copyright 2016
Count 1
